description: A friendly pet with four legs, a tail, and barks.
A fluffy animal that loves to play and says “meow.”
example_usage: A cat is on the mat.

description: The big, bright star that warms our planet.
A round toy for throwing, kicking, or bouncing.
A collection of stories and pictures to read.
example_usage: I like to read a book.

description: A machine with wheels that takes people to places.
A tall plant with a trunk, branches, and leaves.
example_usage: A bird is in the tree.

description: A building where people live with their families.
example_usage: My house has a red door.

description: The colorful, pretty part of a plant that smells nice.
example_usage: I picked a flower for my mom.

description: A clear liquid we drink to stay healthy and play in.
example_usage: I am thirsty, I need some water.
The fish swims in the water.

description: A sweet, round fruit that can be red or green.
example_usage: An apple a day keeps the doctor away.

description: A very young child who needs lots of love and care.
A piece of furniture with four legs for one person to sit.
example_usage: The chair is made of wood.

description: A bird with a flat beak and webbed feet that swims.
example_usage: The duck is swimming in the pond.

description: A small, oval food that comes from chickens.
example_usage: I had an egg for breakfast.

description: An animal with fins and gills that lives in water.
example_usage: The fish is swimming in the tank.

description: A farm animal with horns, a beard, and eats anything.
example_usage: A baby goat is called a kid.

description: A covering for your head to keep you warm or cool.
Frozen water that is very cold and melts in the sun.
example_usage: The drink has ice in it.

description: A sweet drink made from squeezing fruits like apples.
example_usage: I like to drink apple juice.

description: A toy with a string that you fly in the wind.
example_usage: I like to fly a kite.

description: A big, wild cat with a loud roar and a fluffy mane.
example_usage: The lion is the king of the jungle.

description: A healthy white drink from cows that makes bones strong.
A bird’s home made of twigs for laying eggs.
example_usage: The bird is in its nest.

description: A round, orange-colored fruit that is juicy and sweet.
example_usage: Orange juice is made from oranges.

description: A pink farm animal with a curly tail and a flat snout.
A royal lady who wears a crown and rules a country.
example_usage: The queen lives in a castle.

description: A small, furry animal with long ears and a fluffy tail.
example_usage: The rabbit is eating a carrot.

description: A twinkling light in the night sky, far, far away.
example_usage: I see a star in the sky.

description: A big, wild cat with orange fur and black stripes.
example_usage: The tiger is a wild animal.
